overview:
Andrew is the VP of Business Develop at Bizness Apps, a DIY iPhone and Android app platform that allows any small business to easily create, edit, and manage mobile apps online without any programming knowledge needed.

Andrews main job is to formulate the strategic direction of the company. In the past, Chalmers made it to Entrepreneur’s top 10 college entrepreneurs for his business concept. He is a serial entrepreneur and loves Bizness Apps with all his heart.
